title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Buildings
description: In 2019, Saint Kitts and Nevis had one of the lowest methane emissions from buildings in the world, with only 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Lowest F-gases Emissions from Industrial Processes
description: In 2023, Saint Kitts and Nevis recorded one of the lowest F-gases emissions from industrial processes, at 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Lowest Number of Child Deaths (Ages 5-9)
description: In 2021, Saint Kitts and Nevis had one of the lowest numbers of deaths among children aged 5-9, with only 1 recorded death.

title: Lowest Number of Child Deaths (Ages 10-14)
description: In 2023, Saint Kitts and Nevis reported one of the lowest numbers of deaths among children aged 10-14, with only 1 recorded death.
